word:
We can say the Lord is giving us precious victory but it has been a hard battle from the very first. God has been giving me strength every day. I was very feeble when I left Oakland, so weak I could scarcely stand alone, but I have been receiving strength from the first day I bore my testimony. I believe it was right I came here.--Letter 19, 1884. 









Ellen G. White Estate 
Silver Spring, Maryland 
January 17, 1991, Entire Letter.
